note: Pro-life, practicing Catholic. Over 30 years of service in the assistive technology field. Visually impaired, born Jewish and was received into the Catholic church in 2007. Hobbies include learning about, using and assisting others with assistive technology, reading and watching SF and learning more about my faith. JAWS user since v1.0, NVDA user since 2009. Expect to see posts from this account on technology, puns and Babylon 5.

Pro-life, practicing Catholic. I enjoy science fiction with Babylon 5 being my favorite series. Owner of the Tech-VI announcement list to receive regular updates in the blindness technology space. To subscribe, send email to tech-vi+subscribe@groups.io. Over thirty years of experience working in the assistive technology field. JAWS 2022 and NVDA 2019 certified. Using JAWS since v1.0 and NVDA since 2009. Unborn lives matter.
